results.content:
Pros:
Very good introduction to Node, Express, and Tools like Gulp and Bower. The tools are very useful in real world development. 

Cons:
Some videos are cut out and doesn't show the whole development.
No source or no link to tutors' git project.
Can be more detailed by taking a bigger project/application.
Should've been a 'Build from Scratch' and no bootstrap.
C9 is nice introduction, but not very helpful, would rather prefer to setup on env on local machine itself.

Comments:
I would like to have an Advanced version of this course with bigger project to build. Also a more detailed sections/tutorial on tools  like Bower, Gulp, Yeoman, configuring enterprise grade applications.

results.content: There were some glitches with one video. The course was great for an introductory course. However, supporting documentation would have been useful. I also felt that even though it was only an introduction it could have used a little more information about Node.js itself and less about the other utilities.
results.content_html: There were some glitches with one video. The course was great for an introductory course. However, supporting documentation would have been useful. I also felt that even though it was only an introduction it could have used a little more information about Node.js itself and less about the other utilities.

results.content:
* Excellent hands on demo. Quickly gets you started and introduces lots of key concepts, features and related tools.
* I developed locally but the demo follows a cloud IDE so people who don’t want to install software can get started quickly.
* The only thing missing would be code on github with commit points to co-inside with each of the lessons.
results.content_html:
* Excellent hands on demo. Quickly gets you started and introduces lots of key concepts, features and related tools.
* I developed locally but the demo follows a cloud IDE so people who don’t want to install software can get started quickly.
* The only thing missing would be code on github with commit points to co-inside with each of the lessons.

results.content: Excellent!  I learned more in the few hours of this course than larger 30+ hour courses!  The course went at a great pace, and the instructor explained each step conceptually before coding anything.  My only issue with this course was that most of the fonts were far too small to see clearly.
results.content_html: Excellent! I learned more in the few hours of this course than larger 30+ hour courses! The course went at a great pace, and the instructor explained each step conceptually before coding anything. results.content: The screen is too small. Not easy to read in Laptop (14 inch). Other are very Excellent!
